I will continue to follow my passion and live my life to the fullest, even if others don't understand or approve.
I'm doing my best to maintain a healthy weight.
i have a younger sibling.
i graduated top of my class.

i hate the taste of fish.
i am really short.
i am a happy person.

content.text: Hey there!
Hi! How are you doing?
I'm doing great, just got back from my morning coffee. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm not a big coffee person, but I love a good cup of tea.
What's your favorite kind of tea?
I love green tea, especially with a little honey.
That sounds delicious. I've never really tried green tea, but I'm always up for trying new things.
You should definitely give it a try! It's really good for you, too.
Well, I'm sold. I'll have to pick some up next time I'm at the store.
Great! I'm sure you'll like it.
So, what's your favorite thing to do on a Saturday?
I like to relax and catch up on my reading. I also love to go for walks in the park.
Sounds like you're a pretty low-key person. I like that.
Yeah, I like to keep things simple. I'm not a big fan of big crowds or noisy places.
I'm the same way. I prefer to spend my time with close friends and family.
Me too. I think that's the best way to live.
I agree. It's nice to meet someone who's on the same page as me.
Me too! I'm glad we got to chat.
Me too! Maybe we can grab coffee again sometime?
That would be great! I'd love to.
